posts.title: 太无聊了，开始写博客吧🙈
posts.text: 下面贴几张图测试一下图片功能 OK, it works!!!－－－－－－－－－－－下面是几个链接是关于如何用hexo创建自己的博客并通过github页面发布出来，希望对跟我一样在寒冷的冬日里无奈着的且也想写个博客的小伙伴有所帮助。https://guides.github.com/features/pages/https://blog.kavoori.com/2014-10-13/installing-hexo-on-ubuntu.htmlhttps://gist.github.com/btfak/18938572f5df000ebe06fbd1872e4e39

posts.title: 我的研究
posts.text: 一句话说就是：想方设法给医生提供可做诊断依据且高质量的医学影像。而我研究主要涉及紧跟着的这一些名词MRI, image reconstruction, inverse problem, deep learning, imaging sequence. 大家应该都见过，甚至也体验过MR检查

posts.text: Angry angry annoyed irritated fed up pissed off put out dipleased mad belligerent HappyExcitedSuprisedUpset

posts.title: Caffe源码阅读（一）
posts.text: 感觉某种意义上Caffe等于coffee,提神😂，但是👴作为自己博士工作的一部分，要给Martin的bart toolboox添砖加瓦，负责深度学习重建部分的工作。先学习下caffe，并作记录 那就从这里开始吧！

posts.title: Notes for me, maybe for you
posts.text: How to ssh your lab server swiftly?Always feel annoyed with the input of IP and password, when you are about to login your lab server. Try these commands below. 123#first use ssh-keygen to generate your public keyxxx@xxx:~$ ssh-keygen#then ask your admin to authorize you public key How to compress your images with nearly invisible loss?Always pissed off by large photos from you cellphone, when you are preparing them for your blog post. Never mind, several simple ubuntu commands might help you. 1234#first to resize images to certain sizeconvert test.jpg -resize 2048x test-2048x.jpg#then compress itconvert test-2048x.jpg -quality 50 test-2048x-50p.jpg How to keep processes running after ending ssh sessionThe first thing you need to do is to install screen Execute screen in terminal, then you get into a virtual terminal. You are supposed to run you program that you want it keep running in the virtual terminal. Then, 1: pressCtrl+A, 2: pressD, to detach current virtual terminal and bring you back to the normal terminal. Use screen -r take you back to virtual terminal. More questions? Refer to this page How to crop away the white margin of your pdf figures How to concatenate/burst your pdf files with pdftk

posts.title: Words to replace "do"
posts.text: handle manage manipulate grasp hold deal with treat control govern conduct trade retail accomplish complete achieve achieve a consensus achieve a settlement achieve your purpose achieve an objective achieve a balance achieve prominence achieve independence undertake/carry out undertake a task/project undertake work. The work is being undertake by team of experts. Students may undertake full-time supervised research leading to the award of a Ph.D. You should not undertake a long journey if you are unwell. It was not a voyage to be undertaken lightly. serve satisfy answer

posts.title: Python关键字yield
posts.text: 首先需要了解什么是可迭代量（iterables）。比如创建了一个list，你可以逐一读取其中的每一个元素。 123mylist = [x*x for x in range(3)]for i in mylist: print(i) 在Python中可以进行 1for ... in ... 操作的还有strings, files等可迭代量。这些可迭代量非常便于读取，但是所有的值都存储在其中，有些时候这并不是我们想要的。生成器（generators）是一种仅可以被迭代一次但是不需要存储在内存中的可迭代量。 123mygenerator = (x*x for x in range(3))for i in mygenerator: print(i) 仅需要用()代替[]，但是你没办法再次运行 12for i in mygenerator: .... 生成器只生成不储存。yield关键字很多地方跟return一样除了在返回生成器的函数中。 12345678def create_generator(): mylist = range(3) for i in mylist: yield i*imygenerator = createGenerator()print(mygenerator) # my generator is an objectfor i in mygenerator: print(i) 函数返回一串值而你只需要读一次。

posts.title: Python的C/C++ extension
posts.text: 虽然用Python来验证一些计算问题是非常方便的，但有时候不可避免的需要用到一些C/C++库，此时通过extension来调用他们是一个不错的选择。

posts.title: 什么是self attention? 什么是transformer?
posts.text: 注意力(attention)即能够集中精力，其在网络中能发挥什么作用呢？
